value:
Many expect that a king will bring
peace with his rule. Not I. I bring
annihilation.

The Kingdom of Nohr and the
Kingdom of Hoshido... All of it
will be mine, as Anankos decreed.

You! You're in my way. Cease your
loitering. You are a mere tactician—do
not think yourself above your station.

What is your objective? You will join
together with me, and we will crush
our foes. That is our fate.

Burn it all until even the ashes are
no more... In time, even this world
will be consumed by destruction.

So you are $Nu.
I am King Garon of Nohr.

It will be I, Garon, who rules Nohr and
Hoshido as king—for all eternity!

Bwahaha! This... It comes to me, as is
right...
What...is...this...

Hahaha! Good! One step closer to
fulfilling my ambitions...

I am Garon, King of Nohr. A little
worm like you, trying to take the
measure of me? A futile effort!

There is a difference between you
and the preening and posturing
fools here, $Nu...$k$pYou seem to have purpose.$k$pHehehe... Do not misunderstand me.
Do not expect praise! Your life has
no worth to it. No one's does! $k$pI am no exception. Devote yourself to
your land, your people, your wife,
your children... They will all vanish.$k$pHehe...bwahaha! Do you understand?
Everything...will be gone one day.$k$pTogether, all will perish. It is the will
of Anankos, and I understand it
acutely...
ふんっ！
むぅん！
ぬおおっ！
馬鹿な…！
Vanish into the darkness!
I relish this chance.
You can't possibly win!
You are no match for me!
I refuse to accept...
ふはははっ！
What business have you with Garon, the King of Nohr?
We of the royal family are descendants of the ancient gods, the First Dragons.
As the inheritor of divine strength, I conquer those who oppose me with ease.
Corrin... I should have killed you when I had the chance.
There should be no path that results in my defeat. Not the King of Nohr...
To long for defeat at the hands of my own child... Inconceivable.
This feeling... It is not unfamiliar. How long has it been since I felt this way?
Come to me.
Oh, yes.
Well, well...
